content: if you have any questions please let me know if you do not have the brand of yarn specified to fit the teething ring size specified you must use a thin variety of dk or average 4ply yarn this pattern is free to view on my blog a pdf version is available at a small cost which contains photo instructions of how to attach the head to the ring you will need * yarn needle * soft toy filling * 6mm safety eyes * 3mm crochet hook * 24mm rattle ball * 55mm teething ring * black 4ply yarn for mouth * dk yarn approx 40m note that these brands are a thinner dk yarn 4ply maybe more suitable -baby joy dy choice dk sunrise yellow wendy peter pan dk cream wendy peter pan dk brown stitches and abbreviations used * magic_ring - magic_ring/ring single_crochet unless otherwise specified * chain - chain * single_crochet - single_crochet * increase - increase stitch 2 single crochets into one stitch * decrease - decrease stitch single_crochet 2 stitches together * flo - front loop only * blo - back loop only * st - stitch * slip_stitch - slip_stitch * r - round or row * fo - finish off *you are welcome to sell items and share pictures made using this pattern but do not sell or share the pattern itself *
